Description:
Multiplatform Connectivity: A universal 3.5mm connection is compatible with PC, Mac, consoles, mobile, and more, for an audio advantage in all your games.

Custom-Tuned 50mm Audio Drivers: Hear the entire range of your in-game audio with custom-tuned wide-frequency audio drivers.
Stress-Free Sound: A floating headband design provides cloud-like comfort, aided by cushioned soft fabric ear pads. Listen and play for hours at a time.

High-Quality Omni-Directional Microphone: Capture your calls and commands with stunning clarity with a flexible omni-directional microphone.

On-Ear Mute and Volume Controls: The push-in mute button and volume wheel put audio controls within easy reach.
Label: Headset Corsair HS35 v2
